# Problem Set
## Question 1:
Using a loop, print the integers from 1 to 50.
```{r}
for (i in 1:50) {
  print(i)
}
```

## Question 2:
A. Using a loop, add all the integers between 0 and 1000.
```{r}
a <- 0
for (i in 0:1000) {
  a <- a+i
}
a
```
